title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1595/91 of 12 June 1991 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80 determining the intervention centres for cereals
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1595/91  of 12 June 1991  amending Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80 determining the intervention centres for cereals
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
The section headed 'Portugal' in the Annex hereto is hereby added to the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80.  Article 2
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1991. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 June 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 81, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 353, 17. 12. 1990, p. 23. (3) OJ No L 130, 19. 5. 1976, p. 8. (4) OJ No L 197, 30. 7. 1980, p. 1. (5) OJ No L 267, 29. 9. 1990, p. 5.
